Title: Directs the department of labor to study the impact of long COVID on employees and on the labor market
Summary: Directs the department of labor to study the impact of long COVID on employees and on the labor market; directs the department of labor to issue a report of its findings and recommendations to the governor, the speaker of the assembly and the temporary president of the senate and to publish such report on its website within one year.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the department of labor to study the impact of long COVID on employees and on the labor market
